home.slider1_title: A construction and renovation brokerage firm.
home.slider3_title: Full range of building materials you need
home.about_description: We are a leading construction and renovation brokerage firm, dedicated to delivering innovative and tailored solutions for both residential and industrial projects. Our team combines expertise, creativity, and precision to ensure every project meets the highest standards of quality, safety, and sustainability. From concept to completion, we transform visions into reality, making your spaces functional, beautiful, and future-ready.
home.fact_step1_desc: Provide requirements, scope and budget for the system to suggest suitable partners.
home.fact_step2_desc: Partners submit capacity profiles, quotes, timelines and implementation conditions.
home.fact_step3_desc: Compare profiles, negotiate terms and choose the most suitable option.
home.fact_step4_desc: Sign agreements, monitor progress, acceptance and post-construction support.
home.features_intro: We provide a comprehensive solution for finding and managing construction contractors. From partner selection, progress monitoring to quality assurance, the system helps you save time and costs in every project.
home.features_item3_title: A large number of grateful customers
home.features_item_desc: Optimal, transparent and fast solutions in every stage of construction and repair projects.
home.testimonial_intro: The construction and repair service management system is really impressive. The interface is friendly, easy to use, helping me save time and manage my work more effectively.
home.testimonial1_text: The system is very easy to use and convenient. I can manage repair and construction requests quickly and clearly. Very satisfied with the user experience.
home.testimonial2_text: I am very satisfied with this system.Progress, cost and personnel management are all done clearly and transparently. Thanks to the system, the construction and repair process becomes professional and has less risks.

about.hero_description: At HomeCareDN, every project begins with purpose and is driven by passion. We don't just construct buildings we create lasting spaces that reflect our clients' goals and values.
about.section_title: Built on Experience. Driven by Quality.
about.section_description: With over 15 years in the industry, we bring a hands-on, client-first approach to every project. Our team blends craftsmanship, innovation, and trust to deliver excellence.
about.stat1_text: Proven track record across residential, commercial, and industrial sectors
about.stat2_text: We integrate the latest construction technologies to ensure efficiency and sustainability
about.stat5_text: Our team of seasoned engineers brings decades of expertise to every project, ensuring the highest standards of quality and safety.

why.title: Why Builders Trust
why.intro: At HomeCareDN, we don't just build — we build with purpose, integrity, and precision. Our reputation is grounded in trust, quality, and client satisfaction.

f1.title: Experienced & Skilled Team
f1.desc: Decades of hands-on experience with a team of certified engineers, architects, and project managers who understand every detail of construction.

f2.title: High-Quality Craftsmanship
f2.desc: We combine traditional techniques with modern innovations to deliver long-lasting, precision-built structures — every time.

f3.title: Client-Centered Approach
f3.desc: We listen, plan, and collaborate closely with clients to ensure every project aligns with their vision and expectations.

process.title: Our 4-Step Process to a Successful Build.
process.intro: At HomeCareDN, we don't just build — we craft. Every space we deliver is a reflection of thoughtful design, expert planning, and precise execution.

s1.title: Understanding your needs
s1.desc: We listen closely to your goals, challenges, and vision to deliver.

s2.title: Detailed timeline & quote
s2.desc: We provide transparent project timelines and accurate cost estimates.

s3.title: Expertly Built With Care
s3.desc: Every structure we build reflects our commitment to quality craftsmanship.

s4.title: Final Check & Handover
s4.desc: Before delivery, we conduct a thorough final inspection to ensure everything.

partnerRegistration.process_infor: Your request will take 3-5 days to process and you will be notified via email as soon as possible. Thank you for trusting and choosing HomeCareDN as your partner.

step2.title: Email Verification
step2.otpSent: Verification code (OTP) has been sent to email:

step3.title: Electronic Contract Signing
step3.contractContent: Both parties agree to enter into a cooperation agreement based on voluntary, equality, and mutual benefit principles with the following terms:
step3.contractDetails:
ARTICLE 1: ROLE AND SCOPE
1.1. HomeCareDN provides the intermediary technology platform connecting Customers and Partners. HomeCareDN does not directly participate in construction, repair, or material manufacturing processes.
1.2. The Partner (Party B) is an independent entity joining the system to provide services or goods to Customers.

ARTICLE 2: PARTNER RESPONSIBILITIES
2.1. Commit to providing truthful and accurate capability profiles, business licenses, and product origins.
2.2. Bear full legal responsibility to the Customer regarding construction quality, labor safety (for Contractors), or product quality and warranty (for Distributors).
2.3. Strictly prohibited from soliciting Customers to conduct transactions off-platform to evade service fee obligations.

ARTICLE 3: RIGHTS AND OBLIGATIONS OF HOMECAREDN
3.1. Maintain stable operation of the Website/App system.
3.2. Collect commission fees on each successful transaction according to the current fee schedule.
3.3. Right to suspend or permanently terminate Partner accounts upon detection of fraud, poor service quality (consistently low ratings), or violation of conduct rules.
3.4. Act as a mediator in case of disputes.

ARTICLE 4: PAYMENT POLICY
4.1. HomeCareDN acts as an escrow agent holding payments from Customers.
4.2. Payments will be disbursed to the Partner's Wallet after the Customer confirms job completion/receipt of goods, minus the Platform's commission fee.

ARTICLE 5: DISCLAIMER OF LIABILITY
HomeCareDN is indemnified from all legal liability regarding damages to persons or property, construction defects, or product faults caused by the Partner to the Customer.
step3.contractCommitment: By signing below, the Partner acknowledges having read and understood HomeCareDN's intermediary role and commits to fully complying with the above terms.
step3.signatureNote: This signature has the same legal validity as a wet ink signature.
